Docs.summary: The base class for retrieving information related to workflows included with Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010.

Docs.param: A template type to retrieve from the specified web and template ID.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a template ID by specifying a web and a template type.

remarks.para: This method does not verify the availability of the request template ID. The caller should verify the availability of the template before proceeding.
